column3: If you want to enable these you actually need to fix all of the warnings / issues in the code. You will see them all in the lint CI output. Or you can run the linter locally.

Ran the linter locally, and can see the following count of cases: 

```sh
$ test/lint/lint-shell.sh | grep SC2046 | wc -l
18

$ test/lint/lint-shell.sh | grep SC2086 | wc -l
178
```

Thanks @fanquake for the clarification, I'll fix all cases and push.
Concept ACK, these seem quite serious.
> This might accidentally fix #12528\n\nNo, it does not fix #12528. Tested on macOS Big Sur 11.6.1 (20G224) + #23462.
Sorry, lost track of this PR. \n\n@hebasto thanks for opening a replacement! Closing this now in favour of yours.
